name: Crocodile Simulator 2015
description:
The Crocodile Simulator can put one back to the virtual wild world!
Entering a wild savanna is not an easy job. You must have never dreamt of what it would be like to be a real crocodile? Now you have a unique opportunity to experience the feeling! Using this simulator one can accept the challenge to live like a crocodile in the savanna full of herbivorous animals like the giraffe, zebra, hippo, elephant, gazelle, buffalo and many more. But all in the form of game and game only.
These are good games with very good graphics that let you have the thrill without any blood and gore. Moreover there is no real fighting or any bite marks on the prey in these games and thus the players are prevented from exposure to atrocities.

Key features:

- Excellent 3D graphics;
- Lot of animals to fight with;
- Easy controls;
- Upgrades like speed and strength;
- Detailed environment and music ambience;
- 2 Crocodiles to choose and play with;

So, if you want to have pretty fun and enjoy amazing thrill and excitement, there is nothing like this Crocodile Simulator.
